revised_title: The Extraordinary Effects of Musk in Convulsive Disorders and the Tunquinese Medicine
tldr: This article discusses the effects of Musk in treating convulsive disorders and the Tunquinese medicine. The author highlights the importance of proper dosage and the potential benefits of using larger quantities of Musk in treatment. The article also shares successful case studies of using Musk to treat convulsive disorders.
